name: Speedrunner's Delight
description:
The game was made in Unity engine by an indie game developer. 

You can also follow the developer on social media!

Instagram ~ @kevinkoljanin

Twitter~@KevinKDev

The game is now also available for free on Game Jolt!

The game is available for free but I would appreciate every single dollar because it would help me to grow as an indie game developer and give me motivation to continue making games. I am also saving some money for new computer gear and it would mean a lot if you donated a dollar or two.
